rows.label: tev001193_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, [ST:playername ]. What a coincidence![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0002
rows.name: Are you interested in cars?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev001193_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you're a real gearhead.

rows.label: tev001193_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Your Head

rows.label: tev001193_SEL0021
rows.name: Confess that you don't really care about cars.

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0003
rows.name:
I expected as much. There's a glint in your eyes that
I recognize from another car-lover I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm hardly an expert on the topic myself, but I know
enough to poke around under the hood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0005
rows.name:
It reminds me how that friend of mine used to use
all kinds of crazy car jargon when he drove me
around in his classic car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0006
rows.name:
Whitewalls. Glass packs. Supercharged Hemi.
Rack and pinion steering. Stuff like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0007
rows.name: Is that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm hardly an expert on the topic, but the cars here
seem different from the ones I knew back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have a gearhead friend who used to use all kinds
of crazy car jargon when he drove me around in
his classic car...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0010
rows.name:
Whitewalls. Glass packs. Supercharged Hemi.
Rack and pinion steering. Stuff like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0011
rows.name:
His car was really old-fashioned, and it stalled all
the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I think that gave me an appreciation for the
history of the automobile. Made me feel like cars
were more than just a bunch of bolts and metal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_JNK0030
rows.name: Show Off

rows.label: tev001193_SEL0031
rows.name: Boast that your first car was steam-powered.

rows.label: tev001193_JNK0040
rows.name: Offer a Ride

rows.label: tev001193_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest to take Elma for a ride once you buy a car.

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0013
rows.name:
Is that so? You must know a great deal about cars
in that case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0014
rows.name:
I'm sure humanity didn't just up and decide to switch
to gasoline overnight, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0015
rows.name:
Technology always evolves to make use of the tools
available to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0016
rows.name:
But if humanity thrives on this planet, the cars we now
see in this city will be considered classics one day
themselves. That would be nice, wouldn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0017
rows.name:
Sounds great. But first we have to bring back the
classic cars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0018
rows.name:
I wonder if there's enough information about old cars
in the Lifehold Archives for us to reproduce them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001193_MSG0019
rows.name:
I know it's hardly feasible now, but let's do what we
can to make it a reality someday. That would really 
be something to look forward to.[ST:wait ]
